title: Question
body: Is there a way that people can see who they have played with (other players not specific champions) the most with the new update? Since, some people are not on as often.

replies.body:
You can see other players you've recently played with if you hit the *Add Friend* button on the social panel of the client (right pane). 

I hope this helped!
na.op.gg has a tracker of who you've played with the most recently and your win rate
